_comment: Generic MCP stdio transport configuration for the Hedera Agent Kit.
This works with any MCP-compatible AI coding agent that supports stdio transport.
1. Replace <PATH_TO_HEDERA_AGENT_KIT> with the absolute path to your cloned hedera-agent-kit-js repo.
2. Replace 0.0.XXXXX and 302e... with your Hedera account ID and DER-encoded private key.
3. Place this config where your agent reads MCP server definitions.
4. To switch to mainnet, change --ledger-id=testnet to --ledger-id=mainnet.
The MCP server communicates over stdin/stdout using the MCP protocol.
It exposes tools for Hedera account, token, consensus, and contract operations.
